kitchen-assossories.Name: Mouth Blown Votive
kitchen-assossories.Body:
Mouth-Blown Votive 

The mouth-blown votives are of high quality and are perfect for a tea light. These candle glasses provide many atmospheric evenings.
This candle glass finds its place on the windowsill, side table, kitchen table, living room table, coffee table, bathroom, bedroom and kitchen.

- Mouth blown
- Thick glass
- Blown in Europe

Every vase/candle glass is mouth blown by glassblowers from our European glass factories.
Each vase can therefore differ slightly in colour and shape. Small deviations such as bubbles and scratches are not defects but a result of the traditional process of traditional glass blowing. They enrich the product and give it a unique appearance.

Colour: Brown

Size: H7.5 x D7.5 cm 

Lead Time: Available

NOTE BODY POSE & TOP TIP: The knees to chest pose stretches and eases tension pain in the lower back and massages the abdominal organs. The pose reduces bloating, improves circulation and rebalances energy.

kitchen-assossories.Name: Stack Of 3 Bracelets Rainbow Sunset
kitchen-assossories.Body:
Stack Of 3 Bracelets Rainbow Sunset 

Set of 3 bracelets in Rainbow gemstone, delicately-strung, this colourful bracelet is adorned with rainbow sunset coloured beads, which symbolise love. Complemented with gold round beads and wheels, mother of pearl cross, a pretty freshwater pearl featuring 1 points of crystal quartz.

You can wear alone, add a pendant, or layer with our other beaded bracelets for a truly colourful statement.

Colour: Rainbow, Red, Mint Green, Banana Yellow, Orange 

Size: Glass beads 6mm and 4mm 

Material: Glass beads, mother of pearl cross, 18-caret gold Plated Spacers and a freshwater pearl. 

Lead Time: In Stock 

Each piece is one of a kind due to the natural state of the stones.

kitchen-assossories.Name: Drago Seagrass Basket
kitchen-assossories.Body:
Drago Seagrass Basket

Tightly, woven seagrass forms an attractive and tangible finish for our Drago basket ware.

The curvaceous shapes and simple handles add charm and understated style.

Fill with indoor plants or use for storage.

Materials: Seagrass

Size Medium: 30 x 38 (dia)

Size Large: 40 x 56 (dia) 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

To care for these baskets we recommend using a soft-bristle brush to regularly remove any built up dust. To clean the item, you can use a mild soap and water on a soft cloth to wipe away any dirt. Due to the natural material, please do not use any harsh chemical cleaning products. Colour may fade in sunlight. Indoor use only.

kitchen-assossories.Name: Tundo Iron Candle Stand
kitchen-assossories.Body:
Our Tundo candle stand makes a sophisticated statement. The saucer-shaped candle holder, perfectly suited to a pillar candle, allows the candle to be completely on display while the tall, elegant stem is truly eye-catching.

Although it looks delicate, it’s crafted from forged cast iron and has a weighted base for extra stability. Its rustic antique brass finish was skilfully created during the soldering process.

Style next to your fireplace for a beautiful display as a pair. 

Available in two sizes.

Material: Iron

Colour: Antique Brass 

Dimensions Small: 63 x 13 x 13cm

Dimensions Large: 80 x 13 x 13cm

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Floor Candle holders should only be used on firm, level ground. Ensure the pillar candle is securely positioned in the candle holder before each use. Never position near drapery. Avoid positioning next to, or over upholstered furniture or carpeted surfaces. This product will get hot in use. Keep out of reach of children. Wait until fully cooled before handling. Never leave a burning candle unattended. To care for the item, we recommend washing with a mild dish soap and warm water to remove any excess wax after every use to prevent a build up. Please do not use harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners as this may damage the finish.

Mouth-Blown Votive 

The mouth-blown votives are of high quality and are perfect for a tea light. These candle glasses provide many atmospheric evenings.
This candle glass finds its place on the windowsill, side table, kitchen table, living room table, coffee table, bathroom, bedroom and kitchen.

- Mouth blown
- Thick glass
- Blown in Europe

Every vase/candle glass is mouth blown by glassblowers from our European glass factories.
Each vase can therefore differ slightly in colour and shape. Small deviations such as bubbles and scratches are not defects but a result of the traditional process of traditional glass blowing. They enrich the product and give it a unique appearance.

Due to our handmade nature of our sculptures, each is truly unique and variations in shape, size, texture and colour may occur; any imperfections should be celebrated. No two pieces are the same  

Made with love.  

Size: 32cm 

Comes in two colours 

Colour: Dark

accessories.Name: Drago Seagrass Basket
accessories.Body:
Drago Seagrass Basket

Tightly, woven seagrass forms an attractive and tangible finish for our Drago basket ware.

The curvaceous shapes and simple handles add charm and understated style.

Fill with indoor plants or use for storage.

Materials: Seagrass

Size Medium: 30 x 38 (dia)

Size Large: 40 x 56 (dia) 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

To care for these baskets we recommend using a soft-bristle brush to regularly remove any built up dust. To clean the item, you can use a mild soap and water on a soft cloth to wipe away any dirt. Due to the natural material, please do not use any harsh chemical cleaning products. Colour may fade in sunlight. Indoor use only.

accessories.Name: Tundo Iron Candle Stand
accessories.Body:
Our Tundo candle stand makes a sophisticated statement. The saucer-shaped candle holder, perfectly suited to a pillar candle, allows the candle to be completely on display while the tall, elegant stem is truly eye-catching.

Although it looks delicate, it’s crafted from forged cast iron and has a weighted base for extra stability. Its rustic antique brass finish was skilfully created during the soldering process.

Style next to your fireplace for a beautiful display as a pair. 

Available in two sizes.

Material: Iron

Colour: Antique Brass 

Dimensions Small: 63 x 13 x 13cm

Dimensions Large: 80 x 13 x 13cm

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Floor Candle holders should only be used on firm, level ground. Ensure the pillar candle is securely positioned in the candle holder before each use. Never position near drapery. Avoid positioning next to, or over upholstered furniture or carpeted surfaces. This product will get hot in use. Keep out of reach of children. Wait until fully cooled before handling. Never leave a burning candle unattended. To care for the item, we recommend washing with a mild dish soap and warm water to remove any excess wax after every use to prevent a build up. Please do not use harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners as this may damage the finish.

art.Name: Red Mark Portrait Framed Printed Canvas - Mineheart
art.Body:
Red Mark Portrait Framed Printed Canvas - Mineheart 


Mineheart introduces a new wall art series by Young and Battaglia studio in collaboration with guest artist Kirin Young. The 'Spatula' collection features classical portraits defaced with bold colourful brushstrokes to conceal the subjects original identity.  Each art print is printed on stretched canvas and mounted in a black wooden box frame.

One of a collection of 4 designs; Yellow Mark, Black Mark & Blue Mark are also available.

Why not make a wow factor gallery wall by displaying all 4 designs together? 

Made in England, each artwork is printed on stretched canvas and mounted in a black wooden box frame.

Size: 66cm x 81.3cm (Standard canvas, classic black colour box frame)

Lead Time: 1-5 days

Custom made sizes and frame options available on request.

art.Name: Portrait of Blue and White Butterfly on Lady
art.Body:
Portrait of Blue and White Butterfly on Lady


Contemporary portrait wall art utilizing the 18th century Portrait of a Lady wearing blue silk by Thomas Hudson now adorned with a blue and white butterfly. The beautifully dressed woman in a striking blue garment is an 18th century style portrait with a modern adornment, a beautiful butterfly. Part of a series of works that are a collaboration between Young & Battaglia and Kirin Young that all feature a butterfly obscuring the face of the subject. One of the more unique aspects within this work is the butterfly’s size in context with the woman. Fun is being had with the placement of the butterfly but, as with other works in the series, the butterfly isn’t entirely out of place due to the pallet. Here the butterfly is even less misplaced as the striking nature of the butterfly matches that of the woman and it’s as if they are partners in the image.

A perfect piece of striking colour for anywhere in your home but perhaps best used in the bedroom or office to evoke your imagination and display a side of prominence and passion from your character.

Dimensions: 

Mini size:       (H) 50.8 cm   x (W) 40.6 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 20.00” x 15.98” x 1.25”

Frame : 3.2cm classic black colour box frame

Lead Time : 1-2 weeks

art.Name: Portrait of Black and Green Butterfly on Lady
art.Body:
Portrait of Black and Green Butterfly on Lady

Artist/s Young & Battaglia In 

Collaboration with artist Kirin Young 


Contemporary version of a portrait of Queen Henrietta Maria painted by Van Dyck in the early to mid 17th century. Young & Battaglia and Kirin Young give you an alternative to a painting which currently hangs within Buckingham Palace. This playful version is adorned by a black and green butterfly. The charming and friendly demeanour and nature of Queen Henrietta is somewhat emphasised in many respects by the fashioning of a butterfly landing gently on the canvas. Humour, fun, mystery and intrigue is at play as it is in the whole series of the Butterfly portraits. Again like the other works in the series your minds eye almost completes the image should you try and look through the Butterfly as you scan around it.

We can imagine the contemporary version hanging in Buckingham Palace, this could be a perfect artwork for your very own palace or castle.

Size: 

  • Small size:           (H) 50.8 cm   x (W) 40.6 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 20.00” x 15.98” x 1.25”
  • Medium size:       (H) 81.3 cm   x (W) 66.0 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 32.00” x 25.90” x 1.25”

art.Name: Portrait of Black and Red Butterfly on Man
art.Body:
ARTIST/S : YOUNG & BATTAGLIA IN COLLABORATION WITH ARTIST KIRIN YOUNG.


Contemporary portrait wall art in the form of Jean-Baptiste Colbert from the mid 17th century by Philippe de Champaigne with the addition of black and red butterfly. In the spirit of having some fun you could sometimes perceive that it could come at the expense of someone. The subject beneath the butterfly is arguably a good ‘someone’ being a quite aloof and arrogant Jean-Baptiste Colbert whom, despite having a large responsibility in helping ensure France’s economic well-being for two centuries with the founding of the Académie Royale, Colbert was also the author of what became the Code Noir (1685). This decree gave legal sanction to a brutal system of torture and repression intended to enforce the institution of slavery in the French colonial empire, restricted the activities of free Blacks, made Roman Catholicism a compulsory religion, and ordered Jews to leave the colonies. So to poke fun at such a person could be a source of satisfaction. The butterfly here is predominantly dark but with it still carries a softness and gentle nature to temper the dark image beneath.

A striking artwork for your foyer or hallway to evoke debate on the juxtaposition of the two subjects.

DIMENSIONS 

  • Small size:           (H) 50.8 cm   x (W) 40.6 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 20.00” x 15.98” x 1.25”
  • Medium size:       (H) 81.3 cm   x (W) 66.0 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 32.00” x 25.90” x 1.25”
  • Large size:           (H) 127.0 cm x (W) 101.6 cm  x (D) 3.2 cm  / 50.00” x 40.00” x 1.25”
  • Extra Large size: (H) 172.7 cm x (W) 137.2 cm  x (D) 3.2 cm  / 67.99” x 54.02” x 1.25”

Frame : 3.2cm classic black colour box frame

Lead Time : 1-2 weeks

art.Name: Ibride Portraits Mille De Maupin
art.Body:
Ibride Portraits Mille De Maupin

 

Before surrendering to men’s advances, Mlle de Maupin decides to dress up as a man in order to uncover their secrets. She sets off to travel the world under the false name of Theodore, in search of gallant affairs.
Inspired by the Theophile Gautier universe, and initially created for mural use, this Mlle de Maupin (ibride©) portrait depicts a modern and audacious woman who plays with codes of propriety.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

art.Name: Ibride Portraits Rastignac
art.Body:
Ibride Portraits Rastignac

 

Protagonist of 27 novels from the Comédie Humaine, the handsome Eugène de Rastignac is seductive, disillusioned, cynical, playful, borderline immoral and desperately trying to belong to high society, all at the same time.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.
Inspired by the Balzac universe and initially created for mural use, this Rastignac (ibride©) portrait depicts this audaciously romantic, elegant and reckless lover.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

art.Name: Ibride Portraits Chatterton
art.Body:
Ibride Portraits Chatterton

Chatterton, a misunderstood young poet, opposes his fellow citizen’s prosaic materialism with his exhilarating idealism. Despite his struggles as a writer, Chatterton, the true romantic hero, is sincere, honest and even rejects the notion of compromise against all opposition.


Inspired by the Alfred de Vigny universe and initially created for mural use, this Chatterton portrait (ibride©) depicts this passionately romantic, elegant yet tormented lover.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

art.Name: The Pink Pencil Canvas
art.Body:
The Pink Pencil Canvas  

Pencil portraits, a reminder to smile and not take life too seriously, a humble pencil under the nose is enough to brighten our day. Our posture, the way we move and our facial expressions all affect our emotions... so remember to smile and you will feel happier, stand tall and you will be stronger, and move gracefully and you will feel like a ballerina!

Designed by Mineheart. Made in England.

Dimensions:

Small: 813mm high x 660mm wide x 40mm deep
Medium: 1270mm high x 1016mm wide x 40mm deep
Large: 1727mm high x 1372mm wide x 46mm deep

Fixtures: included

Lead Time: 1-2 weeks

art.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart - Gold Edition

‘Air is not enough…’ gets a new look - black and white vintage feel like of an old photograph with touches of gold on the attire. All that glitters is not gold, though!
This beautiful print, reminiscent of classic Dutch Old Master paintings, is of a woman drinking from a large glass of purest swirling air. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.

Dimensions: 813mm h x 660mm w x 40mm d (available in one size)

Delivery time: 1 week

art.Name: Grandfather Olaf - Gold Edition
art.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Angela Rossi in collaboration with Mineheart - Gold Edition

‘Grandfather Olaf’ gets a new look - black and white vintage feel reminiscent of old photographs with touches of gold on the attire. He is rocking that gold jacket!
Create your own family gallery with these quirky gents, who regard you from their canvas-printed frames with regal bearing and military might. The portraits are a happy marriage between Angela Rossi and Mineheart’s imaginations and are sure to fit with any interior scheme with a sense of humour. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.

art.Name: 'AIR' CANVAS WITH PRINTED FRAME
art.Body:
'Air' is part of the collection and features an extra large ornate frame printed onto canvas.
This Stunning print, in a classical Dutch style, of a women drinking a large glass of air, creating a look of unsatisfaction.
Due to the stunning nature and size of the canvas, it is ideal as a feature piece for both domestic and commercial purposes and comes with a cleverly integrated large ornate frame, printed onto the canvas, saving you from having to go out and find that perfect frame!

A collaboration between Young & Battaglia and digital artist Himitsuhana, this stunning image is printed onto the finest quality canvas.

Made in England

Sizes: (L x W x D)
S: 810x660x40mm - 3kg
L: 1270x1000x40mm - 6kg
XL: 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm- 10kg

Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

PLEASE NOTE: The frame is not a solid frame, and is part of the printed canvas. It is printed onto the canvas as is the image.

art.Name: 'Rapunzel' - Ornate Framed Canvas Print
art.Body:
This giant printed canvas features an artwork by artist Himitsuhana inside an ornate gold frame which is also digitally printed onto the canvas.

'Rapunzel' depicts an imprisioned young lady gazing longingly at the outside world, her beautiful, flowing, long red hair catching the rays of sunlight that shine through the window.

The piece is inspired by the beautiful paintings of the Italian and Dutch renaissance.

Instead of oil paint, Himitsuhana uses the latest in photographic and digital techniques to create her artworks.

Larger than life, the extra large size stands at an impressive 173cm high, and is designed to be hung on the wall or rest on the floor.

Avaiable in three sizes, these artworks can create a stunning feature in any traditional and contempoary interior, and the cleverly printed surround saves you having to go out and find that perfect frame!

Designed by Young & Battaglia with artwork by Himitsuhana, these stunning images are printed onto the finest quality canvas and stretched on to 38mm thick wooden frames.

Made in England


Specifications (LxWxD):

S: 810x660x40mm
L: 1270x1000x40mm
XL 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm


Lead time: 2 Weeks

art.Name: Mirror Mirror
art.Body:
'Mirror Mirror'

This portrait by Himitsuhana depicts a young lady in traditional dress holding a mask, yet the mask is a perfect and magical replica of her face. Referencing the masked balls which were so popular in the 18th century, Himitsuhana has created a curious tableaux, the lady looks pensive and is dressed in black, the mask is a metaphor for her life. 

Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

art.Name: Water Is Not Enough
art.Body:
Water Is Not Enough

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

In this portrait by Himitsuhana a young lady washes at the side of a babbling brook, dressed in luxurious velvets and taffeta, we can see this is no servant girl.  Cherubs and landscape are glimpsed in the background. This picture is a modern twist on the traditional pastoral portraits of the 18th century when landed gentry were depicted outside in their pleasure gardens and grottos. The deep aquamarine blues and greens of the dress and flowing water suggest that this painting would be perfect for creating a focal point in a bathroom. Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Lead Time: 1 Week

This image by Himitsuhana shows a young dandy dressed in his fine embroidered frock coat and feathered cap. With a musket in one hand and a blazing rose in the other. Does it speak of unrequited love or a scorned declaration? This impressive picture will provide a talking point in any room.

Made in England

Sizes: (L x W x D)

Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

art.Name: Senora Emanuela
art.Body:
Image by Angela Rossi
Made in England by Mineheart
Angela Rossi works with recycled, abused, broken and forgotten items creating altered antique plates, raw assemblage sculptures and mixed media portraits.
Bury your mind and indulge yourself in this beautifully surreal canvas. The collaboration with the artist has resulted in the creation of this fantastic piece of art. How many people will take a second look? The ornate, gold frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas. This arresting print is available in three sizes and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.
Sizes: (L x W x D)
Extra Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm
Large 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

art.Name: ‘Red Roses’ Printed Canvas
art.Body:
'Red Rose' printed canvas

God gave us wine to gladden the heart. But this portrait by Himitsuhana features a woman troubled by love. The deep dark red of the roses and wine hint to her story that she is longing to tell. Featuring an ornate frame printed onto the canvas, this is a modern take on a renaissance print.

A collaboration between Mineheart and digital artist Himitsuhana, this stunning image is printed onto the finest quality canvas.

Printed Frame dimensions:​

Small 813mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1016mm x 40mm

Large 1727mm x 1372mm x 46mm


Real Wooden Frame dimensions:

Small: 750mm high x 650mm wide

Medium: 1158mm high x 904mm wide

Large: 1362mm high x 1056mm wide

Delivery time 3 to 4 weeks for all sizes.

Design by Himitsuhana
Made by Mineheart

art.Name: Rays Of Spring
art.Body:
Rays Of Spring 

 

The proximity of a modern palette - intriguingly extended over the painting’s frame creates a captivating concept. Designers Young & Battaglia playfully blur the boundaries between the frame and the artwork by superimposing fragments of colour over a traditional neoclassical portrait and frame, both of which are digitally printed on to the canvas itself. The paintings subject, Rosalba, is re-imagined for the 21st Century, refracted through prismatic schemes to bring her beauty alive again.

Rays Of Spring refracts light tones to bring a hint of colour to the piece.  This beautiful print is available in three sizes, and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.

Size

Small  -  810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium - 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Extra Large - 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm

Theme

Winter, Rosa, Fragment, Kaleidoscope, Canvas, Neoclassival, Prismatic, Spring, Colourful 

Made to order

Lead time 1-2 Weeks.

art.Name: Strange Fruit
art.Body:
Strange Fruit

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The ‘Strange Fruit’ canvas postulates that art and food are perfectly peculiar partners, a casebest made when the freshest food on the table is drizzled with the essence of the world’s warmest colour.

This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas. 

 Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

Made in England

Specifications (LxWxD):

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Lead Time: 1 Week

pet-accessories.Name: Stack  Of 3 Smile Gemstone Bracelets
pet-accessories.Body:
Stack Of 3 Smile Gemstone Bracelets 

We're absolutely smitten with the happiness that radiates from this enchanting Mother of Pearl Star, gemstones, and Smile Bracelet. It's the ultimate way to illuminate your wrist with sheer brilliance!

pet-accessories.Name: Stack Of 3 Bracelets Fluorescent Yellow
pet-accessories.Body:
Stack Of 3 Bracelets Fluorescent Yellow

A Set of 3 Bracelets in Fluorescent Yellow gemstone, delicately strung, this beautiful set is adorned with pretty Yellow-coloured beads, which symbolise wisdom and deep connection. 

Complemented with 18 caret gold-plated round beads, mother of pearl cross and a pretty freshwater pearl.

A hint of a smile from this ermine-clad damsel. Every inch of her intricate attire is faithfully and digitally reproduced on this tall cabinet, ideal as a small wardrobe or drinks cabinet, and standing 140 cm high. Black satin finish with touch catches and two shelves inside.

canvas-prints.Name: ‘Red Roses’ Printed Canvas
canvas-prints.Body:
'Red Rose' printed canvas

God gave us wine to gladden the heart. But this portrait by Himitsuhana features a woman troubled by love. The deep dark red of the roses and wine hint to her story that she is longing to tell. Featuring an ornate frame printed onto the canvas, this is a modern take on a renaissance print.

A collaboration between Mineheart and digital artist Himitsuhana, this stunning image is printed onto the finest quality canvas.

Printed Frame dimensions:​

Small 813mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1016mm x 40mm

Large 1727mm x 1372mm x 46mm


Real Wooden Frame dimensions:

Small: 750mm high x 650mm wide

Medium: 1158mm high x 904mm wide

Large: 1362mm high x 1056mm wide

Delivery time 3 to 4 weeks for all sizes.

Design by Himitsuhana
Made by Mineheart

canvas-prints.Name: Madam Blush Gold Edition
canvas-prints.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Gold Edition

In the Gold Edition ‘Madame Blush’ gets a new look - this time the delicate visage of the classical portrait has been defaced by gold spray paint in an act of modern day mischief. A very stylish type of vandalism!
The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas. 

Dimensions: 508mm h x 406mm w x 40mm d (available in one size)

By Mineheart 

Delivery time: 1 week

canvas-prints.Name: Air Is Not Enough - Gold Edition
canvas-prints.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart - Gold Edition

‘Air is not enough…’ gets a new look - black and white vintage feel like of an old photograph with touches of gold on the attire. All that glitters is not gold, though!
This beautiful print, reminiscent of classic Dutch Old Master paintings, is of a woman drinking from a large glass of purest swirling air. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.

Dimensions: 813mm h x 660mm w x 40mm d (available in one size)

Delivery time: 1 week

canvas-prints.Name: Brother Stanwick - Gold Edition
canvas-prints.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Angela Rossi in collaboration with Mineheart - Gold Edition

‘Brother Stanwick’ gets a new look - black and white vintage feel reminiscent of old photographs with a gold paint dripping from his prominent antlers. A very stylish type of vandalism!
Create your own family gallery with these quirky gents, who regard you from their canvas-printed frames with regal bearing and military might. The portraits are a happy marriage between Angela Rossi and Mineheart’s imaginations and are sure to fit with any interior scheme with a sense of humour. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.


Dimensions: 660mm h x 559mm w x 40mm d (available in one size)

Delivery time: 1 week

canvas-prints.Name: 'AIR' CANVAS WITH PRINTED FRAME
canvas-prints.Body:
'Air' is part of the collection and features an extra large ornate frame printed onto canvas.
This Stunning print, in a classical Dutch style, of a women drinking a large glass of air, creating a look of unsatisfaction.
Due to the stunning nature and size of the canvas, it is ideal as a feature piece for both domestic and commercial purposes and comes with a cleverly integrated large ornate frame, printed onto the canvas, saving you from having to go out and find that perfect frame!

A collaboration between Young & Battaglia and digital artist Himitsuhana, this stunning image is printed onto the finest quality canvas.

Made in England

Sizes: (L x W x D)
S: 810x660x40mm - 3kg
L: 1270x1000x40mm - 6kg
XL: 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm- 10kg

Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

PLEASE NOTE: The frame is not a solid frame, and is part of the printed canvas. It is printed onto the canvas as is the image.

canvas-prints.Name: The Orange Pencil Canvas
canvas-prints.Body:
The Orange Pencil Canvas

Pencil portraits, a reminder to smile and not take life too seriously, a humble pencil under the nose is enough to brighten our day. Our posture, the way we move and our facial expressions all affect our emotions... so remember to smile and you will feel happier, stand tall and you will be stronger, and move gracefully and you will feel like a ballerina!

Designed by Mineheart. Made in England.

Dimensions:

Small: 813mm high x 660mm wide x 40mm deep
Medium: 1270mm high x 1016mm wide x 40mm deep
Large: 1727mm high x 1372mm wide x 46mm deep

Fixtures: included

Current lead time: 1-2 weeks

canvas-prints.Name: Mirror Mirror
canvas-prints.Body:
'Mirror Mirror'

This portrait by Himitsuhana depicts a young lady in traditional dress holding a mask, yet the mask is a perfect and magical replica of her face. Referencing the masked balls which were so popular in the 18th century, Himitsuhana has created a curious tableaux, the lady looks pensive and is dressed in black, the mask is a metaphor for her life. 

Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

Lead Time: 1 Week

In this portrait by Himitsuhana a young lady washes at the side of a babbling brook, dressed in luxurious velvets and taffeta, we can see this is no servant girl.  Cherubs and landscape are glimpsed in the background. This picture is a modern twist on the traditional pastoral portraits of the 18th century when landed gentry were depicted outside in their pleasure gardens and grottos. The deep aquamarine blues and greens of the dress and flowing water suggest that this painting would be perfect for creating a focal point in a bathroom. Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Lead Time: 1 Week

canvas-prints.Name: Strange Fruit
canvas-prints.Body:
Strange Fruit

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The ‘Strange Fruit’ canvas postulates that art and food are perfectly peculiar partners, a casebest made when the freshest food on the table is drizzled with the essence of the world’s warmest colour.

This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas. 

 Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

Made in England

Specifications (LxWxD):

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Lead Time: 1 Week

canvas-prints.Name: Senora Emanuela
canvas-prints.Body:
Image by Angela Rossi
Made in England by Mineheart
Angela Rossi works with recycled, abused, broken and forgotten items creating altered antique plates, raw assemblage sculptures and mixed media portraits.
Bury your mind and indulge yourself in this beautifully surreal canvas. The collaboration with the artist has resulted in the creation of this fantastic piece of art. How many people will take a second look? The ornate, gold frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas. This arresting print is available in three sizes and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.
Sizes: (L x W x D)
Extra Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm
Large 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm
Theme: Extra large canvas, ostrich, portrait, gold frame, animals in art
Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

canvas-prints.Name: 'Rapunzel' - Ornate Framed Canvas Print
canvas-prints.Body:
This giant printed canvas features an artwork by artist Himitsuhana inside an ornate gold frame which is also digitally printed onto the canvas.

'Rapunzel' depicts an imprisioned young lady gazing longingly at the outside world, her beautiful, flowing, long red hair catching the rays of sunlight that shine through the window.

The piece is inspired by the beautiful paintings of the Italian and Dutch renaissance.

Instead of oil paint, Himitsuhana uses the latest in photographic and digital techniques to create her artworks.

Larger than life, the extra large size stands at an impressive 173cm high, and is designed to be hung on the wall or rest on the floor.

Avaiable in three sizes, these artworks can create a stunning feature in any traditional and contempoary interior, and the cleverly printed surround saves you having to go out and find that perfect frame!

Designed by Young & Battaglia with artwork by Himitsuhana, these stunning images are printed onto the finest quality canvas and stretched on to 38mm thick wooden frames.

Made in England


Specifications (LxWxD):

S: 810x660x40mm
L: 1270x1000x40mm
XL 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm


Lead time: 2 Weeks

canvas-prints.Name: Winters Morning
canvas-prints.Body:
Winters Morning 

The proximity of a modern palette - intriguingly extended over the painting’s frame creates a captivating concept. Designers Young & Battaglia playfully blur the boundaries between the frame and the artwork by superimposing fragments of colour over a traditional neoclassical portrait and frame, both of which are digitally printed on to the canvas itself. The paintings subject, Rosalba, is re-imagined for the 21st Century, refracted through prismatic schemes to bring her beauty alive again. Winters Morning refracts sombre tones to bring a hint of mystery to the piece.

This beautiful print is available in three sizes, and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.

 

 

Size Small - 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium - 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm Extra

Large - 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm

Theme Winter, Rosa, Fragment, Kaleidoscope, Canvas, Neoclassival, Prismatic.

 

Made to order,

Lead time 2-3 Weeks.

Rays Of Spring refracts light tones to bring a hint of colour to the piece.  This beautiful print is available in three sizes, and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.

Size

Small  -  810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium - 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Extra Large - 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm

Theme

Winter, Rosa, Fragment, Kaleidoscope, Canvas, Neoclassival, Prismatic, Spring, Colourful 

Made to order

Lead time 1-2 Weeks.

chairs.Name: RM58 Armchair
chairs.Body:
RM58 Armchair In Two Options Classic and Matte.


The RM58 Armchair designed in 1958 by designer Roman Modzelewski has made its re-debut.

Originally designed in 1958, the RM58 was a unique object not only in Poland but throughout the world. The contemporary chair even forms part of the permanent collection of the Victoria & Albert Museum.

We can all fully appreciate its classic beauty and sit comfortably in a designer chair that is more than just a museum piece.

This chair comes in a choice of finishes and colours.

RM58 armchair in two options – Classic and Classic Matte.

Material: 

Classic: fibreglass covered with gelcoat. Note Handmade. 

Classic Matte: rotomolded and made of polyethylene.

Legs: powder coated steel
Leg ends: anti-slip

Suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

cushions.Name: Feon Linen Cushion Cover
cushions.Body:
The Feon Linen cushion covers are skilfully handwoven from pure linen. The linen has a laid back slubby texture that feels tactile and relaxed.

The neutral tone of the Feon linen cushion cover makes it an easy and versatile addition to a seating area, inside or out.

The neutral colours make this a versatile choice for combining with other scatter cushions.

Materials: Linen

Size: 50 x 50cm 

Size: 60 x 40cm 

Does not include cushion 

Care instructions 

To care for your cushion covers, wash at 30 degrees and steam iron only (if required). Use a mild detergent. There may be shrinkage when washing, do not tumble dry and do not bleach. Colours may fade in direct sunlight.

doormats.Name: Boobies Doormat
doormats.Body:
Boobies Doormat

Of course your thinking a doormat is just a doormat BUT is yours a Boobies Doormat? 

We're not just your average doormat. Our doormat is produced from the best quality & well coloured doormat base and we use quality paints produced in the UK especially for our door mat material to be used indoor and have good water resistance for outdoor use. Our doormats are then hand sprayed in the UK and shipped freshly to your door.

Each of our doormats we send to you are: 

  •  Made with a non-slip PVC backing.
  •  Natural coir (coconut fibre).
  •  Suitable for indoor & outdoor sheltered use.
  •  Hand finished in the UK.
  •  60cm X 40cm X 1.5cm depth.

Choose the perfect design for you & your home.

Lead time: In Stock

Originally designed in 1958, the RM58 was a unique object not only in Poland but throughout the world. The contemporary chair even forms part of the permanent collection of the Victoria & Albert Museum.

We can all fully appreciate its classic beauty and sit comfortably in a designer chair that is more than just a museum piece.

This chair comes in a choice of finishes and colours.

RM58 armchair in two options – Classic and Classic Matte.

Material: 

Classic: fibreglass covered with gelcoat. Note Handmade. 

Classic Matte: rotomolded and made of polyethylene.

Legs: powder coated steel
Leg ends: anti-slip

Suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

stools.Name: Ibride Diva Ostrich Console Table
stools.Body:
Ibride Diva Ostrich Wall Console Table 

The Diva Ostrich Wall Console by French designer Ibride is a great feature piece for your home.

Secure this quirky and useful table to your wall in your hallway to greet your guests, or in the living room to house your table lamp.

Forming part of the Mobilier de Compagnie collection, this elegant and eccentric side table is available in various striking colours.  With its fabulous set of legs, this piece is an easy way to bring your animal obsession in to your home whilst giving your space a designer edge ahead of everyone else.

Made from recycled wood pressed into High Pressure Laminate (HPL) it presents excellent mechanical and physical properties, it is particularly dense and resistant, and also weather proof.

The furniture can be used inside or outside in summer or winter.

Colour: Glossy Red, Brushed Black, Glossy Pink, Matt Amaranth. 

Product Type: Console 

Material: Laminated Solid

Size: H 76 cm x L 71 cm x 25 cm

 By IBRIDE 

Comes flat packed

Lead Time 2 Weeks

chandeliers.Body:

Canopy: Matching powder-coated canopy plate

maileg.Name: Maileg Circus With 3 Circus Mice Toys
maileg.Body:
Maileg Circus With 3 Circus Mice Toys

Brand New to 2018 (New Colour) 

A traditional take on play, this modern interpretation of a classic toy from Maileg offers your little ones a visual and textural playground.
The quality and style of this play set is unrivalled amongst toys!

Included is a linen fabric tent, solid rectangular wooden base with 2 wooden painted circus podiums. Wooden tent poles with flags to keep the tent upright and circus rings for the acrobatic mice.

Also included are 3 fun circus mice charaters; the ballerina mouse, strongman mouse and the stilt clown mouse. The Circus tent play set also comes with paper sheets which have fun cutout accessories for the Show - popcorn cutouts, tickets and garlands. This item is presented in a beautifully illustrated box.

Spot clean only

Brand New to 2018 (New Colour) 

A traditional take on play, this modern interpretation of a classic toy from Maileg offers your little ones a visual and textural playground.
The quality and style of this play set is unrivalled amongst toys!

Included is a linen fabric tent, solid rectangular wooden base with 2 wooden painted circus podiums. Wooden tent poles with flags to keep the tent upright and circus rings for the acrobatic mice.

mineheart.Name: Senora Emanuela
mineheart.Body:
Image by Angela Rossi
Made in England by Mineheart
Angela Rossi works with recycled, abused, broken and forgotten items creating altered antique plates, raw assemblage sculptures and mixed media portraits.
Bury your mind and indulge yourself in this beautifully surreal canvas. The collaboration with the artist has resulted in the creation of this fantastic piece of art. How many people will take a second look? The ornate, gold frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas. This arresting print is available in three sizes and is ideal as a feature piece in both domestic and commercial interiors.
Sizes: (L x W x D)
Extra Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm
Large 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm
Theme: Extra large canvas, ostrich, portrait, gold frame, animals in art
Lead Time: 1-2 Weeks

mineheart.Name: The Orange Pencil Canvas
mineheart.Body:
The Orange Pencil Canvas

Pencil portraits, a reminder to smile and not take life too seriously, a humble pencil under the nose is enough to brighten our day. Our posture, the way we move and our facial expressions all affect our emotions... so remember to smile and you will feel happier, stand tall and you will be stronger, and move gracefully and you will feel like a ballerina!

Designed by Mineheart. Made in England.

Dimensions:

Small: 813mm high x 660mm wide x 40mm deep
Medium: 1270mm high x 1016mm wide x 40mm deep
Large: 1727mm high x 1372mm wide x 46mm deep

Fixtures: included

Current lead time: 1-2 weeks

mineheart.Name: Still Pink
mineheart.Body:
Still Pink 

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The Still Pink canvas symbolises a wealth of riches, the cut glass decanters, gold vessels and damask and velvet drapes contrast with the intense pink paint that overflows through the stilllife. It’s pouring its heart out in the brightest of shades. 

 This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas.

 Himitsuhana in collaboration with mineheart

Made in England

Specifications (LxWxD):
Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Lead Time: 1 Week

mineheart.Name: Portrait of Black and Green Butterfly on Lady
mineheart.Body:
Portrait of Black and Green Butterfly on Lady

Artist/s Young & Battaglia In 

Collaboration with artist Kirin Young 


Contemporary version of a portrait of Queen Henrietta Maria painted by Van Dyck in the early to mid 17th century. Young & Battaglia and Kirin Young give you an alternative to a painting which currently hangs within Buckingham Palace. This playful version is adorned by a black and green butterfly. The charming and friendly demeanour and nature of Queen Henrietta is somewhat emphasised in many respects by the fashioning of a butterfly landing gently on the canvas. Humour, fun, mystery and intrigue is at play as it is in the whole series of the Butterfly portraits. Again like the other works in the series your minds eye almost completes the image should you try and look through the Butterfly as you scan around it.

We can imagine the contemporary version hanging in Buckingham Palace, this could be a perfect artwork for your very own palace or castle.

Size: 

  • Small size:           (H) 50.8 cm   x (W) 40.6 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 20.00” x 15.98” x 1.25”
  • Medium size:       (H) 81.3 cm   x (W) 66.0 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 32.00” x 25.90” x 1.25”
  • Large size:           (H) 127.0 cm x (W) 101.6 cm  x (D) 3.2 cm  / 50.00” x 40.00” x 1.25”
  • Extra Large size: (H) 172.7 cm x (W) 137.2 cm  x (D) 3.2 cm  / 67.99” x 54.02” x 1.25”

Frame : 3.2cm classic black colour box frame

Lead Time : 1-2 weeks

Humour, fun, mystery and intrigue is at play as it is in the whole series of the Butterfly portraits. Again like the other works in the series your minds eye almost completes the image should you try and look through the Butterfly as you scan around it.

We can imagine the contemporary version hanging in Buckingham Palace, this could be a perfect artwork for your very own palace or castle.

mineheart.Name: Portrait of Black and Red Butterfly on Man
mineheart.Body:
ARTIST/S : YOUNG & BATTAGLIA IN COLLABORATION WITH ARTIST KIRIN YOUNG.


Contemporary portrait wall art in the form of Jean-Baptiste Colbert from the mid 17th century by Philippe de Champaigne with the addition of black and red butterfly. In the spirit of having some fun you could sometimes perceive that it could come at the expense of someone. The subject beneath the butterfly is arguably a good ‘someone’ being a quite aloof and arrogant Jean-Baptiste Colbert whom, despite having a large responsibility in helping ensure France’s economic well-being for two centuries with the founding of the Académie Royale, Colbert was also the author of what became the Code Noir (1685). This decree gave legal sanction to a brutal system of torture and repression intended to enforce the institution of slavery in the French colonial empire, restricted the activities of free Blacks, made Roman Catholicism a compulsory religion, and ordered Jews to leave the colonies. So to poke fun at such a person could be a source of satisfaction. The butterfly here is predominantly dark but with it still carries a softness and gentle nature to temper the dark image beneath.

A striking artwork for your foyer or hallway to evoke debate on the juxtaposition of the two subjects.

DIMENSIONS 

  • Small size:           (H) 50.8 cm   x (W) 40.6 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 20.00” x 15.98” x 1.25”
  • Medium size:       (H) 81.3 cm   x (W) 66.0 cm    x (D) 3.2 cm  / 32.00” x 25.90” x 1.25”
  • Large size:           (H) 127.0 cm x (W) 101.6 cm  x (D) 3.2 cm  / 50.00” x 40.00” x 1.25”

mineheart.Name: ‘Red Roses’ Printed Canvas
mineheart.Body:
'Red Rose' printed canvas

God gave us wine to gladden the heart. But this portrait by Himitsuhana features a woman troubled by love. The deep dark red of the roses and wine hint to her story that she is longing to tell. Featuring an ornate frame printed onto the canvas, this is a modern take on a renaissance print.

A collaboration between Mineheart and digital artist Himitsuhana, this stunning image is printed onto the finest quality canvas.

Large: 1362mm high x 1056mm wide

mineheart.Name: 'The Purple Pencil' Canvas
mineheart.Body:
The Purple Pencil Canvas 

Pencil portraits, a reminder to smile and not take life too seriously, a humble pencil under the nose is enough to brighten our day. Our posture, the way we move and our facial expressions all affect our emotions... so remember to smile and you will feel happier, stand tall and you will be stronger, and move gracefully and you will feel like a ballerina!

Designed by Mineheart. Made in England.

Medium: 1270mm high x 1016mm wide x 40mm deep
Large: 1727mm high x 1372mm wide x 46mm deep

mineheart.Body:
Available in one size only. Please see dimensions below.

Angela Rossi in collaboration with Mineheart - Gold Edition

‘Brother Stanwick’ gets a new look - black and white vintage feel reminiscent of old photographs with a gold paint dripping from his prominent antlers. A very stylish type of vandalism!
Create your own family gallery with these quirky gents, who regard you from their canvas-printed frames with regal bearing and military might. The portraits are a happy marriage between Angela Rossi and Mineheart’s imaginations and are sure to fit with any interior scheme with a sense of humour. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.


Dimensions: 660mm h x 559mm w x 40mm d (available in one size)

Delivery time: 1 week

This beautiful print, reminiscent of classic Dutch Old Master paintings, is of a woman drinking from a large glass of purest swirling air. The ornate frame is not as it seems; in fact it’s printed onto the canvas.

mineheart.Name: Strange Fruit
mineheart.Body:
Strange Fruit

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The ‘Strange Fruit’ canvas postulates that art and food are perfectly peculiar partners, a casebest made when the freshest food on the table is drizzled with the essence of the world’s warmest colour.

This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas. 

 Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

Made in England

Specifications (LxWxD):

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Lead Time: 1 Week

mineheart.Name: Water Is Not Enough
mineheart.Body:
Water Is Not Enough

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

In this portrait by Himitsuhana a young lady washes at the side of a babbling brook, dressed in luxurious velvets and taffeta, we can see this is no servant girl.  Cherubs and landscape are glimpsed in the background. This picture is a modern twist on the traditional pastoral portraits of the 18th century when landed gentry were depicted outside in their pleasure gardens and grottos. The deep aquamarine blues and greens of the dress and flowing water suggest that this painting would be perfect for creating a focal point in a bathroom. Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

mineheart.Name: Mirror Mirror
mineheart.Body:
'Mirror Mirror'

This portrait by Himitsuhana depicts a young lady in traditional dress holding a mask, yet the mask is a perfect and magical replica of her face. Referencing the masked balls which were so popular in the 18th century, Himitsuhana has created a curious tableaux, the lady looks pensive and is dressed in black, the mask is a metaphor for her life. 

Made in England.

mineheart.Name: Still Life Canvas Print Blue
mineheart.Body:
Scent Of Cobalt' Ornate Framed Canvas Print

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The 'Scent of Cobalt' canvas proves that nature is beautifully constant in its change, offeringendless opportunities to alter the familiar, as with the inclusion of this bright blue splashed across a traditional floral scene.

This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas, Made In England. 
Designed by Young & Battaglia with image by Himitsuhana
Made in England by Mineheart

mineheart.Name: ANNABELLE RUG
mineheart.Body:
Annabelle Rug

The results of an exciting new collaboration between mineheart and renowned international artist Joao Figuieredo. A collection of rugs that infuse modernity with tradition, playing with the whole concept of art and how we appreciate it. By appropriating traditional portraits and taking something away he gives the works new meaning and a surreal twist.

Annabelle - Her substance is still there but all we can glimpse are the finishing touches. A fusion between art and utility, this rug will add a beautifully surreal touch to any interior, and unlike real cowhides this one is hypo-allergenic, washable, and will always lay flat.

Dimension: 1500x1653mm

Thickness: 2mm

Materials: Rubber backed fabric

Dimensions: 150cm x 15cm x 15cm

Lead Time: 2-3 Weeks

Theme: rug, cowhide, mat, feature, designer, art, tradition

new.Name: Talume Jute Runner
new.Body:
Talume Jute Runner 

This incredibly tactile Talume Runner is handwoven using traditional looms from eco-friendly jute.

The unique design is created by weaving and looping the threads into this stylish textured piece.

The contrast of black and natural jute sits beautifully together.

Colour: Black & Natural 

Material: Jute 

Size: 177 x 66cm 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Clean spill immediately by blotting with clean sponge or cloth. Vacuum regularly. Can be professionally cleaned. Colours may fade in direct sunlight. Due to the nature of the materials used some shedding of fibre is to be expected.

Our collections of jute rugs are skilfully woven using age-old methods and traditional handlooms. Jute is a great eco products as it is a rain fed crop that has little need for fertiliser or pesticides. It is a natural vegetable fibre that can be spun into strong and durable threads.

new.Name: Tundo Iron Candle Stand
new.Body:
Our Tundo candle stand makes a sophisticated statement. The saucer-shaped candle holder, perfectly suited to a pillar candle, allows the candle to be completely on display while the tall, elegant stem is truly eye-catching.

Although it looks delicate, it’s crafted from forged cast iron and has a weighted base for extra stability. Its rustic antique brass finish was skilfully created during the soldering process.

Style next to your fireplace for a beautiful display as a pair. 

Available in two sizes.

Material: Iron

Colour: Antique Brass 

Dimensions Small: 63 x 13 x 13cm

Dimensions Large: 80 x 13 x 13cm

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Floor Candle holders should only be used on firm, level ground. Ensure the pillar candle is securely positioned in the candle holder before each use. Never position near drapery. Avoid positioning next to, or over upholstered furniture or carpeted surfaces. This product will get hot in use. Keep out of reach of children. Wait until fully cooled before handling. Never leave a burning candle unattended. To care for the item, we recommend washing with a mild dish soap and warm water to remove any excess wax after every use to prevent a build up. Please do not use harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners as this may damage the finish.

new.Name: Feon Linen Cushion Cover
new.Body:
The Feon Linen cushion covers are skilfully handwoven from pure linen. The linen has a laid back slubby texture that feels tactile and relaxed.

The neutral tone of the Feon linen cushion cover makes it an easy and versatile addition to a seating area, inside or out.

The neutral colours make this a versatile choice for combining with other scatter cushions.

Materials: Linen

Size: 50 x 50cm 

Size: 60 x 40cm 

Does not include cushion 

Care instructions 

To care for your cushion covers, wash at 30 degrees and steam iron only (if required). Use a mild detergent. There may be shrinkage when washing, do not tumble dry and do not bleach. Colours may fade in direct sunlight.

new.Name: Drago Seagrass Basket
new.Body:
Drago Seagrass Basket

Tightly, woven seagrass forms an attractive and tangible finish for our Drago basket ware.

The curvaceous shapes and simple handles add charm and understated style.

Fill with indoor plants or use for storage.

Materials: Seagrass

Size Medium: 30 x 38 (dia)

Size Large: 40 x 56 (dia) 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

To care for these baskets we recommend using a soft-bristle brush to regularly remove any built up dust. To clean the item, you can use a mild soap and water on a soft cloth to wipe away any dirt. Due to the natural material, please do not use any harsh chemical cleaning products. Colour may fade in sunlight. Indoor use only.

prints.Name: Ibride Portraits Chatterton
prints.Body:
Ibride Portraits Chatterton

Chatterton, a misunderstood young poet, opposes his fellow citizen’s prosaic materialism with his exhilarating idealism. Despite his struggles as a writer, Chatterton, the true romantic hero, is sincere, honest and even rejects the notion of compromise against all opposition.


Inspired by the Alfred de Vigny universe and initially created for mural use, this Chatterton portrait (ibride©) depicts this passionately romantic, elegant yet tormented lover.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

prints.Name: Ibride Portraits Mille De Maupin
prints.Body:
Ibride Portraits Mille De Maupin

 

Before surrendering to men’s advances, Mlle de Maupin decides to dress up as a man in order to uncover their secrets. She sets off to travel the world under the false name of Theodore, in search of gallant affairs.
Inspired by the Theophile Gautier universe, and initially created for mural use, this Mlle de Maupin (ibride©) portrait depicts a modern and audacious woman who plays with codes of propriety.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

prints.Name: Ibride Portraits Rastignac
prints.Body:
Ibride Portraits Rastignac

 

Protagonist of 27 novels from the Comédie Humaine, the handsome Eugène de Rastignac is seductive, disillusioned, cynical, playful, borderline immoral and desperately trying to belong to high society, all at the same time.
The limited series of prints is produced on a matt aluminum base and framed by our team using an extra-matt material known for its very silky feel.
Inspired by the Balzac universe and initially created for mural use, this Rastignac (ibride©) portrait depicts this audaciously romantic, elegant and reckless lover.

Size: H.74 x L.56 x W.4 cm

Wall fixings included 

Lead Time: 2 Weeks

rugs-1.Name: ANNABELLE RUG
rugs-1.Body:
Annabelle Rug

The results of an exciting new collaboration between mineheart and renowned international artist Joao Figuieredo. A collection of rugs that infuse modernity with tradition, playing with the whole concept of art and how we appreciate it. By appropriating traditional portraits and taking something away he gives the works new meaning and a surreal twist.

Annabelle - Her substance is still there but all we can glimpse are the finishing touches. A fusion between art and utility, this rug will add a beautifully surreal touch to any interior, and unlike real cowhides this one is hypo-allergenic, washable, and will always lay flat.

Dimension: 1500x1653mm

Thickness: 2mm

Materials: Rubber backed fabric

Dimensions: 150cm x 15cm x 15cm

Lead Time: 2-3 Weeks

Theme: rug, cowhide, mat, feature, designer, art, tradition

rugs-1.Body:

The bottom of the mat has a non-slip layer and the item is 90 centimeters high and 60 centimeters wide. 

Colour: Ivory, Jade

Material: Cotton, latex
Additional info: Machine wash 30 C. Non-slip latex on the backside

rugs-1.Name: Talume Jute Runner
rugs-1.Body:
Talume Jute Runner 

This incredibly tactile Talume Runner is handwoven using traditional looms from eco-friendly jute.

The unique design is created by weaving and looping the threads into this stylish textured piece.

The contrast of black and natural jute sits beautifully together.

Colour: Black & Natural 

Material: Jute 

Size: 177 x 66cm 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Clean spill immediately by blotting with clean sponge or cloth. Vacuum regularly. Can be professionally cleaned. Colours may fade in direct sunlight. Due to the nature of the materials used some shedding of fibre is to be expected.

Our collections of jute rugs are skilfully woven using age-old methods and traditional handlooms. Jute is a great eco products as it is a rain fed crop that has little need for fertiliser or pesticides. It is a natural vegetable fibre that can be spun into strong and durable threads.

rugs.Name: Feon Linen Cushion Cover
rugs.Body:
The Feon Linen cushion covers are skilfully handwoven from pure linen. The linen has a laid back slubby texture that feels tactile and relaxed.

The neutral tone of the Feon linen cushion cover makes it an easy and versatile addition to a seating area, inside or out.

The neutral colours make this a versatile choice for combining with other scatter cushions.

Materials: Linen

Size: 50 x 50cm 

Size: 60 x 40cm 

Does not include cushion 

Care instructions 

To care for your cushion covers, wash at 30 degrees and steam iron only (if required). Use a mild detergent. There may be shrinkage when washing, do not tumble dry and do not bleach. Colours may fade in direct sunlight.

tables.Name: Ibride Diva Ostrich Console Table
tables.Body:
Ibride Diva Ostrich Wall Console Table 

The Diva Ostrich Wall Console by French designer Ibride is a great feature piece for your home.

Secure this quirky and useful table to your wall in your hallway to greet your guests, or in the living room to house your table lamp.

Forming part of the Mobilier de Compagnie collection, this elegant and eccentric side table is available in various striking colours.  With its fabulous set of legs, this piece is an easy way to bring your animal obsession in to your home whilst giving your space a designer edge ahead of everyone else.

Made from recycled wood pressed into High Pressure Laminate (HPL) it presents excellent mechanical and physical properties, it is particularly dense and resistant, and also weather proof.

The furniture can be used inside or outside in summer or winter.

Colour: Glossy Red, Brushed Black, Glossy Pink, Matt Amaranth. 

Product Type: Console 

Material: Laminated Solid

Size: H 76 cm x L 71 cm x 25 cm

 By IBRIDE 

Comes flat packed

Lead Time 2 Weeks

soft-furnishings.Name: Feon Linen Cushion Cover
soft-furnishings.Body:
The Feon Linen cushion covers are skilfully handwoven from pure linen. The linen has a laid back slubby texture that feels tactile and relaxed.

The neutral tone of the Feon linen cushion cover makes it an easy and versatile addition to a seating area, inside or out.

The neutral colours make this a versatile choice for combining with other scatter cushions.

Materials: Linen

Size: 50 x 50cm 

Size: 60 x 40cm 

Does not include cushion 

Care instructions 

To care for your cushion covers, wash at 30 degrees and steam iron only (if required). Use a mild detergent. There may be shrinkage when washing, do not tumble dry and do not bleach. Colours may fade in direct sunlight.

textiles.Name: ANNABELLE RUG
textiles.Body:
Annabelle Rug

The results of an exciting new collaboration between mineheart and renowned international artist Joao Figuieredo. A collection of rugs that infuse modernity with tradition, playing with the whole concept of art and how we appreciate it. By appropriating traditional portraits and taking something away he gives the works new meaning and a surreal twist.

Annabelle - Her substance is still there but all we can glimpse are the finishing touches. A fusion between art and utility, this rug will add a beautifully surreal touch to any interior, and unlike real cowhides this one is hypo-allergenic, washable, and will always lay flat.

Dimension: 1500x1653mm

Thickness: 2mm

Materials: Rubber backed fabric

Dimensions: 150cm x 15cm x 15cm

Lead Time: 2-3 Weeks

Theme: rug, cowhide, mat, feature, designer, art, tradition

textiles.Name: Talume Jute Runner
textiles.Body:
Talume Jute Runner 

This incredibly tactile Talume Runner is handwoven using traditional looms from eco-friendly jute.

The unique design is created by weaving and looping the threads into this stylish textured piece.

The contrast of black and natural jute sits beautifully together.

Colour: Black & Natural 

Material: Jute 

Size: 177 x 66cm 

In Stock 

Care Instructions 

Clean spill immediately by blotting with clean sponge or cloth. Vacuum regularly. Can be professionally cleaned. Colours may fade in direct sunlight. Due to the nature of the materials used some shedding of fibre is to be expected.

Our collections of jute rugs are skilfully woven using age-old methods and traditional handlooms. Jute is a great eco products as it is a rain fed crop that has little need for fertiliser or pesticides. It is a natural vegetable fibre that can be spun into strong and durable threads.

toys.Name: Maileg Circus With 3 Circus Mice Toys
toys.Body:
Maileg Circus With 3 Circus Mice Toys

Brand New to 2018 (New Colour) 

A traditional take on play, this modern interpretation of a classic toy from Maileg offers your little ones a visual and textural playground.
The quality and style of this play set is unrivalled amongst toys!

Included is a linen fabric tent, solid rectangular wooden base with 2 wooden painted circus podiums. Wooden tent poles with flags to keep the tent upright and circus rings for the acrobatic mice.

Also included are 3 fun circus mice charaters; the ballerina mouse, strongman mouse and the stilt clown mouse. The Circus tent play set also comes with paper sheets which have fun cutout accessories for the Show - popcorn cutouts, tickets and garlands. This item is presented in a beautifully illustrated box.

made from: Cotton and wood

Spot clean only

H: 50cm, W: 49cm, D: 47cm

Suitable from age 3+

wall-art.Name: Mirror Mirror
wall-art.Body:
'Mirror Mirror'

This portrait by Himitsuhana depicts a young lady in traditional dress holding a mask, yet the mask is a perfect and magical replica of her face. Referencing the masked balls which were so popular in the 18th century, Himitsuhana has created a curious tableaux, the lady looks pensive and is dressed in black, the mask is a metaphor for her life. 

Made in England.

Size:
Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm

Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 

Himitsuhana in collaboration with Mineheart

Lead Time: 1 Week

wall-art.Name: Still Life Canvas Print Blue
wall-art.Body:
Scent Of Cobalt' Ornate Framed Canvas Print

A bold mixture of past and present, these pictures contrast the dark and moody traditional still life tableaux with eye popping fluorescent paint, begging the question: 'What would the grand masters have done with fluorescents?'

The 'Scent of Cobalt' canvas proves that nature is beautifully constant in its change, offeringendless opportunities to alter the familiar, as with the inclusion of this bright blue splashed across a traditional floral scene.

This stunning image is printed on to a high quality canvas, Made In England. 
Designed by Young & Battaglia with image by Himitsuhana
Made in England by Mineheart

Specifications (LxWxD):

• Large 1730mm x 1370mm x 40mm 
• Medium 1270mm x 1000mm x 40mm
• Small 810mm x 660mm x 40mm

 Lead Time: 1-2 Week
